reviews.text: Have been a client for about 5 years and Nicole & Seth has been a perfect team ,  providing exceptional service from cleaning to fixing spots & stains in pool to pumps repairs when needed. Always punctual & courteous

Direct Pool has been with us for quite a while. Service is excellent always with a beautiful sparkling pool. Steve is aways available for any repairs and Nicole and Seth keep things running. I highly recommend them.

We want to express our sincere appreciation for the excellent service provided by Steve, Nicole and their excellent staff at Direct Pools. Despite our pool’s age, they show up every week with dedication and professionalism. Not only do they maintain our pool, but they also respond quickly and effectively whenever repairs are needed. Their consistent care and attention have made a noticeable difference, and we couldn’t be more grateful for their outstanding work. Thank you, Steve and Nicole, for

We've been using Direct Pools for over 10 years. Steve and Nicole have become friends. She keeps an eye on what additional services the pool might need and occasionally calls me if something is a miss when I've neglected home security. The pool has never looked better. Their rates are reasonable but I wouldn't switch anyway. When my husband was very ill their workers were very kind and brightened his day.

I recently had the pleasure of working with Steve McClaran for the design and construction of my new swimming pool, and I couldn't be more thrilled with the results. From start to finish, the entire process was seamless and exceeded all expectations.

I have used direct pools for the past 6 years. Steve and Nicole are exceptionally knowledgeable, fair and professional people. I have had several items of repair as well as the weekly cleaning and have never been dissatisfied or disappointed. I would recommend them to anyone.

We have a 35 year old pool that developed some major cracks in the she’ll. Steve & his crew were able to fix those cracks & refinished the pool for us & it’s doing great!
We use their cleaning service weekly as well. Always show up & do a great job!

I want to give a shout out to Nicole for all her help making sure our pool is cleaned and running well each week. She takes pride in her work and makes sure anything that goes wrong is taken care of immediately. My Grandmother (Julia Holtzclaw) has used Direct Pools for years and I am posting this for her as she has a broken Clavicle.

Multiple pool workers disrespected my yard and nothing was done about it. All these 5 star reviews are bologna, don't trust these people. They have such a high turn over rate i can only imagine how they treat their employees. 3 pools workers in 3 months!

The staff at Direct Pools is great and has great communication through the entire project! They truly understand pools and everything that comes with them. They are fair and honest. Highly recommend if you want someone who will get the job done.
Direct pools performed a complete pool renovation last summer. The results exceeded expectations. The new pool looks fantastic and they do a great job of weekly maintenance.
